data.apiNameCn: 国内国际退票费计算（订单）
data.introduce:
不取消PNR情况下，自动计算退票费服务是在线分销平台上的一个自动化操作环节的重要服务。
国际国内退票计算服务（AirTicketRefundComputeOrder）提供的服务是：在航信在线分销平台上，根据客户请求，在仅输入订单号票号等较少的参数情况下，对已出票的PNR进行退票费计算的功能。
data.business: 自动计算退票费服务（带订单）实现了在不取消PNR、在仅输入订单号票号等较少的参数的情况下，用于国际国内退票费计算，计算退票金额，每次只针对一张票号进行退票费计算。实现退票计算的自动化。对进行计算退票费的机票须满足以下条件：（1）客票状态为OPEN FOR USE；
data.functions:
本版本支持的自动化计算退票费场景如下：
   ·国内客票
   ·国际客票
   ·支持联票
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketRefundOrderCPRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"航空电子客票退票请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"请求者代码","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"请求类型：OTA定义的ID类型属性: 13(对应IATA_Number)","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"ID上下文类型","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"请求者代码","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"@CityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"出票地三字码(如：PEK)","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"TicketRefundDetailInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"退票请求详细信息","children":[{"name":"PrinterInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"打票机信息","children":[{"name":"@PrintDeviceNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"打票机号","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"TicketRefundInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"退票信息","children":[{"name":"@ETicketType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票客票类型（国际票：I；国内票：D）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"票号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@RefundFormNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票单号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@PassengerType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"旅客类型（如果是婴儿客票，赋值为“I”，否则不填写此字段）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Waiver","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"豁免代码类型","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"CreditCardInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"信用卡信息","children":[{"name":"@CreditCardNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"信用卡卡号（如果不填，默认现金）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CreditCardType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"信用卡类型（与CreditCardNo同时设置或不设置）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"预定信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"预定标识号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"预定标识号上下文，默认为PNR","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"@TransactionIdentifier","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"指令标示：只填写：TRFD（执行退票计算）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}]

","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"RefundFormDetail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"退票结果信息","children":[{"name":"TicketItemInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"票面信息","children":[{"name":"@RefundType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票类型","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@DeviceId","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"打票机号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@RefundDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票日期（如27May16）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@AgentNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票AGENT","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@IataNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票IATA NUMBER","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Office","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票OFFICE","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Waiver","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票豁免信息（国内此项一直是NONE）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@PassType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票旅客类型","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@AirlineCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票航空公司（票号前3位）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票票号（票号后10位）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@TktNumberEnd","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"票号范围的终止票号\n                        （如果是联票，则终止票号为联票最后一张后8位；否则与tktNo后8位一致）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Conjunction","type":"int","quantity":"1","description":"退票联票张数","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票旅客姓名(英文姓名，或者拼音)","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"CommissionInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"代理费信息","children":[{"name":"Commission","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"代理费","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"CommissionRate","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"代理费金额","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"RefundInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"退款费信息","children":[{"name":"PayMethod","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"退票支付方式","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"CurrencyType","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"退票货币类型","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"ETRefund","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"ET标识(Y/N)(是否是电子客票标识)","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"GrossRefund","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","description":"退款毛额总和","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"Deduction","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","description":"退票手续费总和","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"NetRefund","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","description":"净退款额","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"AirlineRefund","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","description":"航空公司向旅客退还的费用","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"Creditcard","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"信用卡信息","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"CouponNumbers","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"退票航段信息集合","children":[{"name":"CouponNumber","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"退票航段信息","children":[{"name":"@CouponNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票航段（票证编号，最多4个，如1200）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"Taxes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"税信息集合","children":[{"name":"Tax","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"税信息","children":[{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"税代码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@TaxAmount","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"税款金额","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"RefundNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"退票单号：如果在TRFD指令中指定退票单号，此处为指定单号。 如果在TRFD中未指定，此处是空或返回0，后续确认RFIS后系统会自动生成退票单号。","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"预定信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"预定标识号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"预定标识号上下文，默认为PNR","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"CouponNumbers","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"退票航段信息集合","children":[{"name":"CouponNumber","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"退票航段信息","children":[{"name":"@CouponNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"退票航段（票证编号，最多4个，如1200）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"编码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"文本","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"错误类型","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" input error ","msgZh":" 输入错误 "},{"code":" -9999 ","name":null,"msg":" unknown error ","msgZh":" 未知错误 "},{"code":" -10080 ","name":null,"msg":" the ticket information is not found ","msgZh":" 找不到客票信息 "},{"code":" -55001 ","name":null,"msg":" fail to price the refund fee ","msgZh":" 计算退票费失败 "},{"code":" -60022 ","name":null,"msg":" order and ticket information don't match ","msgZh":" 订单和票号信息不匹配 "},{"code":" -82003 ","name":null,"msg":" printer number empty ","msgZh":" 打票机号为空 "},{"code":" -82006 ","name":null,"msg":" refund form number format invalid ","msgZh":" 退票单号格式错误 "},{"code":" -82007 ","name":null,"msg":" Has no OPEN FOR USE ","msgZh":" 没有未飞航段,无法退票 "},{"code":" -82008 ","name":null,"msg":" CALL TRR Error ","msgZh":" 调用后台出错，请检查各请求字段是否符合规范 "},{"code":" -82009 ","name":null,"msg":" No Record Retrieved in Database ","msgZh":" OPENTKT无数据，请重出票，确保出票成功 "},{"code":" -82010 ","name":null,"msg":" QUERY Refund DB Failed ","msgZh":" 查询TRR Refund数据库失败 "},{"code":" -82012 ","name":null,"msg":" OFFICE CODE of Old Ticket and New Ticket is Inconsistent ","msgZh":" 原票出票OFFICE和当前OFFICE不一致 "}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirTicketRefundOrderCPRQ TransactionIdentifier="TRFD">
    <POS>
        <Source CityCode="PEK" PseudoCityCode="BJS191">
            <RequestorID Type="13" IDContext="IATA_Number" ID="08200025" />
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="180906104820217167d" ID_Context="ORDER"/>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="HPP4MK" ID_Context="PNR"/>
    <TicketRefundDetailInfo>
        <PrinterInfo PrintDeviceNo="7" />
        <TicketRefundInfo ETicketType="DOMESTIC" TicketNumber="781-2826934162" />
        <CreditCardInfo CreditCardNo="123456789012345" CreditCardType="TP" />
    </TicketRefundDetailInfo>
</TES_AirTicketRefundOrderCPRQ>
